meanings.sent1: The rumpled paper looked messy on the desk.
meanings.sent2: She smoothed out the rumpled shirt before wearing it.

meanings.sent4: His rumpled face showed the stress he had been under.
meanings.sent5: The rumpled map was difficult to read with all its folds.

meanings.sent1: Her rumpled hair stuck out in all directions.
